meanings.definition: Resembling a frieze in appearance or style.
meanings.sent1: The building had a friezelike design along its walls.
meanings.sent2: The artwork featured intricate friezelike patterns.
meanings.sent3: The room looked friezelike with its decorative borders.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed friezelike as she walked down the runway.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a friezelike pattern in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to a frieze.
meanings.sent1: The ancient columns had a friezelike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The new building's architecture was friezelike in nature.
meanings.sent3: The cake decoration was so friezelike, it almost looked real.
meanings.sent4: The music had a friezelike quality, flowing smoothly from one note to the next.
meanings.sent5: The garden fence had a friezelike design that added elegance.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a frieze.
meanings.sent1: The dancers moved friezelike across the stage.
meanings.sent2: She painted the mural friezelike, with careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The wind blew the leaves friezelike, creating a rustling sound.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed friezelike, gently curving through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The flag waved friezelike in the breeze.
